property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrderId" 
    || '::' || CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderDate" AS TIMESTAMP(6))          AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrganizationId" 
    || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOInventoryItemId"                          AS "MaterialMasterPlant",
    CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderNumber" AS VARCHAR(255))                   AS "PlannedSupplyNumber",
    CASE 
        WHEN "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderType" = '1' THEN 'Planned Order'
        WHEN "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderType" = '2' THEN 'Purchase Requisition'
        WHEN "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderType" = '3' THEN 'Production Order'
    END                                                                                                         AS "ObjectType",
    NULL                                                                                                        AS "IsFirmOrder",
    CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOFirmDate" AS TIMESTAMP(6))                      AS "OrderFinishDate",
    "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderQuantity"                                       AS "OrderQuantity",
    "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOImplementQuantity"                                   AS "AdjustmentQuantity",
    "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."ItemCategoriesPEOUomCode"                             AS "QuantityUnit",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                                                           AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO" AS "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"
    INNER JOIN "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO" AS "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"
        ON "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOInventoryItemId" = "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."InventoryItemId"
        AND "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrganizationId" = "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."OrganizationId"
WHERE "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_OrdersPVO"."OrdersPEOOrderQuantity"> 0

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT" || '::' || "PLAF"."PLNUM"                            AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT"                                                      AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    "PLAF"."PLNUM"                                                                                   AS "PlannedSupplyNumber",
    CASE 
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 1 THEN 'Planned Order'
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 2 THEN 'Purchase Requisition'
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 4 THEN 'Production Order'
    END                                                                                              AS "ObjectType",
    CASE 
        WHEN NULLIF("PLAF"."AUFFX", '') IS NULL 
        THEN FALSE 
        ELSE TRUE 
    END                                                                                              AS "IsFirmOrder",
    CAST("PLAF"."PEDTR" AS TIMESTAMP)                                                                AS "OrderFinishDate",
    "PLAF"."GSMNG"                                                                                   AS "OrderQuantity",
    "PLAF"."AVMNG"                                                                                   AS "AdjustmentQuantity",
    "PLAF"."MEINS"                                                                                   AS "QuantityUnit" ,
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT" || '::' || "PLAF"."MATNR" || '::' || "PLAF"."PLWRK"  AS "MaterialMasterPlant"
FROM "PLAF" AS "PLAF"
WHERE NULLIF("PLAF"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL

display_name: PlannedSupply - 00. SAP S/4 HANA Extraction Pool_S4H-HANA

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT" || '::' || "PLAF"."PLNUM"                            AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT"                                                      AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    "PLAF"."PLNUM"                                                                                   AS "PlannedSupplyNumber",
    CASE 
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 1 THEN 'Planned Order'
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 2 THEN 'Purchase Requisition'
        WHEN "PLAF"."OBART" = 4 THEN 'Production Order'
    END                                                                                              AS "ObjectType",
    CASE 
        WHEN NULLIF("PLAF"."AUFFX", '') IS NULL 
        THEN FALSE 
        ELSE TRUE 
    END                                                                                              AS "IsFirmOrder",
    CAST("PLAF"."PEDTR" AS TIMESTAMP)                                                                AS "OrderFinishDate",
    "PLAF"."GSMNG"                                                                                   AS "OrderQuantity",
    "PLAF"."AVMNG"                                                                                   AS "AdjustmentQuantity",
    "PLAF"."MEINS"                                                                                   AS "QuantityUnit" ,
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PLAF"."MANDT" || '::' || "PLAF"."MATNR" || '::' || "PLAF"."PLWRK"  AS "MaterialMasterPlant"
FROM "PLAF" AS "PLAF"
WHERE NULLIF("PLAF"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."DISPOSITION_ID" 
    || '::' || "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."TRANSACTION_ID" 
    || '::' || COALESCE(CAST("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."LINE_ID" AS VARCHAR(255)), '')              AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."ORGANIZATION_ID" 
    || '::' || "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"                                        AS "MaterialMasterPlant",
    CAST("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."DISPOSITION_ID" AS VARCHAR(255))                                AS "PlannedSupplyNumber",
    CASE 
        WHEN "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."ORDER_TYPE" = '5' THEN 'Planned Order'
        WHEN "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."ORDER_TYPE" = '2' THEN 'Purchase Requisition'
        WHEN "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."ORDER_TYPE" = '3' THEN 'Production Order'
    END                                                                                         AS "ObjectType",
     CASE
        WHEN  "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."FIRM_PLANNED_TYPE"='2' THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END                                                                                         AS  "IsFirmOrder",  
    COALESCE("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."FIRM_DATE", "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."NEW_SCHEDULE_DATE")      AS "OrderFinishDate",
    COALESCE("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."FIRM_QUANTITY", "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."NEW_ORDER_QUANTITY") AS "OrderQuantity",
    "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."IMPLEMENTED_QUANTITY"                                                AS "AdjustmentQuantity",
    "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."PRIMARY_UOM_CODE"                                                     AS "QuantityUnit",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                                           AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS" AS "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"
    LEFT JOIN "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B" AS "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"
       ON "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID" = "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"
       AND "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."ORGANIZATION_ID" = "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ORGANIZATION_ID"
WHERE ("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."DISPOSITION_STATUS_TYPE" = 1 OR "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."DISPOSITION_STATUS_TYPE" IS NULL) 
    AND COALESCE("MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."FIRM_QUANTITY", "MRP_RECOMMENDATIONS"."NEW_ORDER_QUANTITY") > 0
    AND "NEW_SCHEDULE_DATE" <= TIMESTAMPADD(MONTH, (4), NOW())  -- Recommendations further than four months in the future are out of scope
